title: Password Hygiene, Loner Throner 12.11.19
itunes:title: Password Hygiene, Loner Throner 12.11.19
description:
In episode 533, Jack and Miles are joined by Hella In Your Thirties co-host and comedian Nick Casalini to discuss Kit Harrington's reaction to his Golden Globe nomination, the two articles impeachment against Trump from the Democrats, Democrats announcing a new USMCA trade agreement, Democrats demanding Stephen Miller be fired, health and human services being a mess, the 35th anniversary of Pee-wee's Big Adventure, password hygiene, Taco Bell developing it's own fake meat, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. 'Game of Thrones' Star Kit Harington Reacts to Golden Globe Nom: "I'm the Loner Throner"
  2. House Democrats Announce Two Articles of Impeachment Against Trump
  3. Democrats announce new US-Mexico-Canada trade agreement with White House
  4. Senate Democrats demand Trump fire Stephen Miller
  5. Scoop: Top Trump officials' feud prompts sex discrimination probe
  6. Exclusive: Key Trump health official spends millions on GOP-connected consultants
  7. Medicare chief asked taxpayers to cover stolen jewelry
  8. ‘Pee-wee’s Big Adventure’ 35th Anniversary Tour with Paul Reubens Kicks Off in February 2020 
  9. It’s not just you. Everyone is bad at password management, study reveals
  10. Taco Bell has developed a meat substitute that looks and tastes like ground beef
  11. WATCH: Sports - Shiggy (feat. KeithCharles)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
